aboutMe: I am a software developer with 3 years of experience in the field of information technology, and 2 year of experience in Frontend and I deal a little bit with the backend development. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and proficient in web development technologies including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind, JavaScript, React.js,Next.js, Mysql, mongodb, Node.js, Express.js. I also have extensive knowledge in other programming languages such as C, Java, PHP, and Python. I have experience using React Hooks, Redux, Socket.io, and JWT, and can quickly adapt to any new library.
